alert.note: Alert for Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin; Uncompahgre Plateau, Dallas Divide; Upper Gunnison River Valley (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 01 at 6:34PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Montrose County through 700 PM MDT... At 634 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Montrose, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Montrose around 645 PM MDT. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 550 in Colorado between mile markers 123 and 130. U.S. Highway 50 in Colorado between mile markers 89 and 109. Colorado 90 between mile markers 82 and 89. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin; Uncompahgre Plateau, Dallas Divide; Upper Gunnison River Valley
